description:
Colby is such a cutie. He has that boy-next-door, "aw shucks" thing going on in a big way.
During his first visit, Colby told me that he loved to fuck a hot ass. I knew that he would be great with Marten because Marten is very laid back and quite skilled at making people feel comfortable.
Colby and Marten hit it off instantly. I wanted to do a still photo shoot before the action started — which we did — but they were so into each other that the photo shoot went right into the fun with no break in between.
After fucking and sucking for nearly two hours — and after nice big loads out of both of them — they disappeared into the shower together. Twenty five minutes later, they both emerged with big smiles on their faces... I can only guess what they were doing!
title: Colby & Marten
